mapper.update:
update sys_menu
parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
perms = #{perms,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
order_num = #{orderNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where menu_id = #{menuId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update sys_menu set parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, perms = #{perms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_num = #{orderNum,jdbcType=INTEGER} where menu_id = #{menuId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
